results.name: Number of divisors of n such that n and n-1 have the same sum of divisors.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10135 (from the b-file at A002961)
program: (MAGMA) [#Divisors(n):n in [2..3500000]| SumOfDivisors(n) eq SumOfDivisors(n-1)]; // _Marius A. Burtea_, Sep 07 2019
results.author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Jan 12 2000
